verbose_text: Since the Ck19 CreERT2 driver line was used to activate HH signaling, we determined how many cells expressed CreER and could undergo recombination by crossing it with a Gt (ROSA) 26Sortm 14 (CAG-tdTomato) Hze (R26 TOM / TOM) reporter to generate the CK19 CreER/+; R26 TOM/+ line.
evidence: Ck19 CreERT2                driver line was used to activate HH
